plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code; you have %d remaining attempt/s.
Incorrect SIM PIN code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
